last_episode_to_air.name: North America
last_episode_to_air.overview: Its a wild look at North America! Stops include Canada, Klondike Acres and Mayberry. That is to say the Histeria! Mayberry.

name: Histeria!
overview: Perhaps the world's only animated sketch-comedy educational series, Histeria! delivers lessons that stick - to your funny bone. Hosted by Father Time, the cartoon cast careens through time to deliver historical facts from Siberia to Sumeria, despite the efforts of Miss Information, the claims of The World's Oldest Woman and the perpetually poopy diapers of the egg-shaped Big Fat Baby.

episodes.name: Inventors Hall Of Fame (1)
episodes.overview: The Histeria! crew enter ""The Telephone Zone"", visit Thomas Edison, play ""Ask Me If I Care"" with Robert Oppenheimer, and get educated on toilets by Mr. Smarty Pants.

episodes.name: The U.S. Civil War (1)
episodes.overview: Abe Lincoln provides a monologue, and gives a Histeria version of the Gettysburg Address. The Histeria gang also listens in to the Hits of the 1860s and The Emancipation Proclamation Hoedown.

episodes.name: The Attack of the Vikings
episodes.overview: The gang sings about being a viking, play see it/don't see it, and Meet the Vikings with Bill Straitman.

episodes.name: The Wild West
episodes.overview: The Histeria gang presents The Billy the Kid show, sings about the gold rush, meets the Earps, and learns about the Pony Express

episodes.name: The American Revolution (1)
episodes.overview: The gang listens to George Washigton give his monologue, visits Molly Pitcher, and attends the Showdown at York.

episodes.name: The Know-It-Alls
episodes.overview: The gang meets Nostradamus, and Rene Descartes, while discussing the Chicken or the Egg?

episodes.name: The Renaissance
episodes.overview: The gang meets Leonardo Da Vinci, see masterpieces of the Renaissance, and explore the book formerly known as ""The Prince"".

episodes.name: The U.S. Civil War (2)
episodes.overview: The gang dives back into the Civil War and sings about it, damns the torpedoes, and visit Abe's Tall and Geeky Shop.

episodes.name: Really Oldies But Goodies
episodes.overview: Its a musical trip to Egypt as the gang sings about mummies, slavin on the pyramids, and sees the Epypt musical ""Cats"".

episodes.name: The American Revolution (2)
episodes.overview: Histeria takes another look at the American Revolution as the gang listen's to George Washington sing a duet with his wife, attend the Boston Tea Party, and see Midnight Line.

episodes.name: A Blast In The Past
episodes.overview: The gang visits the Vomitorium, listen to the Big Fat Twin Babies sing, and meet Romulus and Remus.

episodes.name: China (1)
episodes.overview: The gang takes a pop quiz and joins the Confucius Group again.

episodes.name: Tribute To Tyrants
episodes.overview: The gang meets Atilla the Hun and hear more from Miss Information.

episodes.name: The Montezuma Show
episodes.overview: The gang visits the Scarifical Well, stops in on The Order of the Eagle, and browse the Inca Shopping Network.

episodes.name: Great Heroes Of France
episodes.overview: The gang meets Joan of Arc, sing the Invasion song, and Purchase Louisiana.

episodes.name: The Terrible Tudors
episodes.overview: The gang plays Name Thy Cure, and tell the tale of the Tudors.

episodes.name: The Wheel Of History
episodes.overview: The gang spins the Wheel of History and visits four places in history.

episodes.name: When Time Collides
episodes.overview: The gang looks at the United Nations and honors another Great Women in History.

episodes.name: Around The World In A Daze
episodes.overview: The gang explores explorers exploring the world. Columbus and Magellan.

episodes.name: Histeria Satellite TV
episodes.overview: Tune in to Histeria! Satellite TV for looks at various points in history.

episodes.name: General Sherman's Campsite
episodes.overview: The gang pays a visit to General Sherman's Campsite to learn more about Civil War times.

episodes.name: Return To Rome
episodes.overview: The gang takes a day and looks at how Rome was built and sings about it of course.

episodes.name: Russian Revolution
episodes.overview: The gang takes a look at Stalin and the Soviets.

episodes.name: Inventors Hall of Fame (2)
episodes.overview: The gang once again digs into the Inventors Hall of Fame to honor Ben Franklin, Thomas Jefferson amoung others.

episodes.name: Meglomaniacs
episodes.overview: The gang takes a look at some of the big bad guys of history.

episodes.name: Hooray For Presidents
episodes.overview: The gang meets President Licoln again and explores even more Presidents.

episodes.name: The Thomas Jefferson Program
episodes.overview: Thomas Jefferson leads the fun when the gang learns hadwriting from John Handcock, and makes a flag with Betsy Ross.

episodes.name: More Explorers
episodes.overview: More from the Confucius Group and learn why you should never explore without the Discoverer Card.

episodes.name: Return to China
episodes.overview: More historical sketches regarding China are shown, such as the construction of the Great Wall of China and the Cultural Revolution. Plus, Yin and Yang are presented as superheroes!

episodes.name: Super Writers
episodes.overview: Edgar Allen Poe and Mark Twain join forces to bring writing to the world in Histeria! style!

episodes.name: History Of Flight
episodes.overview: The gang meets the Wright Brothers and parks in the No Parking Zone

episodes.name: Presidential People
episodes.overview: A heavy musical look into the lives and doings of more presidents.

episodes.name: Writers Of The Purple Prose
episodes.overview: Famous writers Samuel Butler and William Shakespeare and see Marry had a Little Lamb 2000.

episodes.name: Histeria Around The World (1)
episodes.overview: The gang learns the complete an unabridged history of Greenland, Antartica, and New Zeland and play Ask Me If I Care.

episodes.name: When America Was Young
episodes.overview: Danial Boone and Benedict Arnold star in their own shows depicting the Revolutionary War and The Western Frontier.

episodes.name: Loud Kiddington's Ancient History
episodes.overview: The gang sees the First Wheel, sing about the names of the Gods, and see an Oylmpic Moment.

episodes.name: Super Amazing Constitutions
episodes.overview: The Constitution gets a Histeria! overhal and the gang meets Andrew Jackson and fire when they see the whites of thier eyes.

episodes.name: Better Living Through Science
episodes.overview: The gang takes The Road of Invention to see what goes up, must come down and witness great moments in medicine.

episodes.name: The Dawn Of Time
episodes.overview: Histeria! takes a scientific twist and looks at the dawn of time where only the World's Oldest Women knows much about. Dinosaurs included!

episodes.name: Music
episodes.overview: Histeria! looks at music and wonder Music to Who's Ears? with Motzart. Plus, Big Fat Baby and twin sing a jingle.

episodes.name: World War II
episodes.overview: Histeria! introduces the Freedom League and learns why there is nothing to fear from Franklin D. Roosevelt.

episodes.name: The Teddy Roosevelt Show
episodes.overview: Histeria! meets Teddy Roosevelt and explores the canal of Doom.

episodes.name: Communuts
episodes.overview: A twisted Histeria! look at communists including wraps from Winston Churchill and Will Rogers.

episodes.name: Americana
episodes.overview: A patriotic look at American lifestyles now and how they used to be and pay a visit to Berry Ding Live.

episodes.name: 20th Century Presidents
episodes.overview: A Histeria! look at president Nixon and John F. Kennedy along with a little scandal called Watergate then Rally At The Beach with Pepper!

episodes.name: Histeria Around The World (2)
episodes.overview: The Great Woman World leaders therapy group and the Pastry War along with another round of Ask Me If I Care with Gandhi.

episodes.name: Histeria! Goes to the Moon
episodes.overview: Its one small step for man and one giant laugh for Histeria! as they set foot on the moon with Niel Armstrong and Apollo 13.

episodes.name: Heroes of Truth and Justice
episodes.overview: Histeria! takes a march with Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. and boycotts Busses and attend the trial of the century witch Socrates.

episodes.name: Euro-Mania
episodes.overview: Its off to Europe to witness the Renaissance and a scrapple at the chaple with another round of Ask Me If I Care with Charlemagne.

episodes.name: Big Fat Baby Theatre
episodes.overview: Take a look at random moments in history through the eyes of Big Fat Baby.

episodes.name: France
episodes.overview: The gang meets Nostradamus and a guy named Louie. Napoleon also appears (many size jokes ensue). And don't forget to take the Tennis Court Oath.

episodes.name: North America
episodes.overview: Its a wild look at North America! Stops include Canada, Klondike Acres and Mayberry. That is to say the Histeria! Mayberry.
